page.title: 02 INTRODUCTION
page.content: The main feature of our block is of river valley farmland. There are two small villages,{Rowhedge}and {Fingringhoe,}and part of the residential area of Colchester. Most of the land is owned by the{Ministry {of Defence,}and part is used as ranges. The{Roman River}which rises some l5 miles away flows through the area, and joins the{River Colne}at{Rowhedge. The N.E. corner of our region includes the industrial area of {Wivenhoe. } { }The southern boundary of the block contains part of the villages of {Abberton}&{Langenhoe. {
